Color

The primary color will be used for highlighted elements like buttons or links, and black for copy. Secondary colors will be for things like

Web

Primary Color

Hex = #dbf235
RGB = rgb(232, 244, 9)

When used as the background, please add 0.7 opacity. 


RGBA = rgba(232, 244, 9, 0.7)

Hex = #dbf235
RGB = rgba (43,181,238)

Secondary Color

Hex = #51dad0
RGB = rgb(238,43,204)
